org.hibernate.tool.schema.spi

Interface DefaultSizeStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dialect.DefaultSizeStrategyImpl

    public interface DefaultSizeStrategy
    Pluggable strategy for determining the Size to use for columns of a given SQL type when no explicit Size has been given. Allows Dialects, integrators and users a chance to apply default column size limits in certain situations based on the mapped SQL and Java types. E.g. when mapping a UUID to a VARCHAR column we know the default Size should be `Size#length == 36`.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Size resolveDefaultSize(SqlTypeDescriptor sqlType, JavaTypeDescriptor javaType)
      Resolve the default Size to use for columns of type `sqlType`.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveDefaultSize

        Size resolveDefaultSize(SqlTypeDescriptor sqlType,
                        JavaTypeDescriptor javaType)
        Resolve the default Size to use for columns of type `sqlType`. The corresponding `javaType` is passed to allow customization when mapping to attributes of that `javaType`. `null` is a valid return value indicating that no Size should be applied.
